channel.title: LSE:RIO on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LSE:RIO on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Rio Tinto Wants to Invest More in US Copper
item.description: Rio Tinto Plc says it has a “strong desire” to invest in US copper mining following President Donald Trump’s plans to levy imports of the critical metal.
